name: Abandonment
description: Kevin found his wife missing when he returned home from a business trip. He was worried that his wife would be kidnapped by a "pregnant killer". Kevin decided to set out to find his wife and uncover the truth behind her kidnapping.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: win7/win10 Processor: intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7300HQ CPU @ 2.50GHz 2.50GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: win7/win10 Processor: intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7300HQ CPU @ 2.50GHz 2.50GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 4GB
